text: Ljutomer (; ) is a town in northeastern Slovenia, some 40 km east of Maribor. It is the seat of the Municipality of Ljutomer. It was part of the region of Styria. It is now included in the Mura Statistical Region.Ljutomer municipal site The economy of Ljutomer is largely based on grape farming and wine making. ==References== Category:Towns in Slovenia
title: Ljutomer
